body:
Hello my IGN is captainlippy and i have donated today i would just like to say that this will be my new active server and that i hope that i can make some Friends on here
I am 14 years old
I live in canada
I love hunting/fishing
I am an outdoors man
I like to play walls and nebula
My other hobbies are Hockey and Mine Craft

Hope to see you on the server @_@

title: Hello

replies.body:
Welcome to avicus m8!!! Just make sure you read the rules and also make sure to check out the plug.DJ. We got some sick parties on there sometimes and I would love to see you there.sometime! :] if you ever need help just contact a staff member or just post on the forums.

Enjoy your time here m8! :]

replies.body: Bonjour fellow Canadian! Welcome to the forums! As Riley said above PlugDJ is a fun place to hang out c: But make sure to follow the server rules so you don't get in any trouble.  See ya around!
replies.body_tagged: Bonjour fellow Canadian! Welcome to the forums! As Riley said above PlugDJ is a fun place to hang out c: But make sure to follow the server rules so you don't get in any trouble.  See ya around!

replies.body: Welcome to the Avicus Network, hope to see you around sometime, and hope you enjoy your stay! ^-^
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the Avicus Network, hope to see you around sometime, and hope you enjoy your stay! ^-^

replies.body: Welcome to the Avicus Network! Thanks for donating, it really helps out the server :) If you ever have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask me or another staff member. See you around!
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to the Avicus Network! Thanks for donating, it really helps out the server :) If you ever have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask me or another staff member. See you around!

replies.body: Hey there fellow Canadian :DD Nice to hear that you've donated, thanks for that <3 If you ever have any concerns or questions, or just need someone to talk to. I, as well as most of the staff members would be happy to help. See you around :D
